A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While it was enjoyable as a movie\, it was not enjoyable as a Star Wars film-let alone another chapter in the main/Skywalker Star Wars saga. The tone and pacing are off-too much comic book movie style humor\, and anime inspired cinematography.\n\nThere characters had nothing at stake-nothing to lose that meant anything to the audience. What was the point of this story within the main saga?
